name: readim
description: Universal Image File Reader. In the Browser, uses read-pixels. In NodeJS, uses jpeg-js or pngjs.

scripts.build: npm run build:node && npm run build:web
scripts.build:node: npx webpack --devtool eval-source-map --entry ./src/readim.js --output-filename readim.node.js --output-path dist -t node
scripts.build:web: npx webpack --devtool eval-source-map --entry ./src/readim.js --output-filename readim.web.js --output-path dist -t web

author: Daniel J. Dufour
